name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SnapzBack - Multi Layout Manager: Sync & Save

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boosts your productivity by saving and restoring your Chrome window layouts and switching between them with a click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SnapzBack is the perfect productivity tool for managing your browser workspace. This handy extension lets you save the positions, sizes, and open tabs of your Chrome windows, making it a breeze to manage your layouts. Restore your browser setups and tab sets quickly whenever you need to, and create multiple window arrangements designed for your various tasks or projects.

Use the extension without registration, or create a user account to access your personalized window layouts anytime, anywhere.

If you work in a team, share your saved window layouts and websites effortlessly, enhancing collaboration and improving your workflow.

With its robust support for multiple tabs and monitors, SnapzBack elevates your browsing experience to the next level.
